function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of Stata software for data analysis","Impact":"Potential discrepancies between p-value and confidence interval","Mitigation":"Use multiple statistical tools to cross-validate results","Technologies":"Statistical software and tools","People":"Researchers, statisticians","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Large sample size for quantitative questionnaire","Impact":"Risk of spread of contagious diseases due to large-scale data collection","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and safety protocols for data collection","Technologies":"Hygiene and safety equipment, digital data collection tools","People":"Survey participants, field researchers","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Six variables related to household and dwelling characteristics","Impact":"Complexity in analyzing and interpreting relationship between variables","Mitigation":"Utilize advanced statistical models and techniques","Technologies":"Advanced statistical software and models","People":"Data analysts, statisticians","Owner":"Research team"}]}
